content:

thought: To craft a lime_banner, I need to craft a stick. To craft a stick, I need to place 2 bamboo side by side in the crafting grid. I will first move 1 bamboo from slot 20 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 20 to slot 1 with quantity 1
